opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (Civ. NO. 03-1-2422-12)

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: LEVINSON, J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Upon consideration of the application for writ of certiorari filed on July 9, 2008 by the defendant-appellee-petitioner The Way of Salvation Church, the application is hereby rejected.Page 1
